message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be open to $105?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $105 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Would you be willing to pay $108 for the product?
